title: Briyani and The Scar
content:
Some Briyani bretheren have witnessed the devastating damage done to some of the lands in Eshil, especially The Scar. Upon first sight, a Briyani will act in absolute shock and wouldn't be able to move further. Most will go down on their knees crying at the scene. Their hearts have difficulty bearing and seeing such damage to pure and beautiful land.

If poked correctly, they can turn the love for the land into a raging anger that could possibly be pointed at those responsible...
